question: The Directorate General of Foreign Trade (DGFT) has lifted restrictions on export of formulations made of which medication?
explanation:
The Directorate General of Foreign Trade (DGFT) has lifted restrictions on export of formulations of Paracetamol and fixed dose combinations of the drug.
In the wake of domestic supply concerns, the DGFT has barred the export of paracetamol and 13 other active pharmaceutical ingredient (API), as well as their formulations, in March 2020. Now though the restriction is relaxed, export of the active pharmaceutical ingredient (API) remains barred.
